item.title: Sam says

Sam Altman on Twitter

‚Äúeliezer has IMO done more to accelerate AGI than anyone else. certainly he got many of us interested in AGI, helped deepmind get funded at a time when AGI was extremely outside the overton window, was critical in the decision to start openai, etc.‚Äù

item.title: On the military potential of balloons

William ‚ÄúBalloon Guy‚Äù Kim on Twitter

‚ÄúI‚Äôm not sure people realize how big of a deal this is. High-altitude balloons might not be as sexy as autonomous weapons or hypersonics but I think they have the potential to be just as revolutionary for warfare, if not more so. üßµ 1/10‚Äù
